name: ÁED - The Spark of Life
description:
Keep ÁED, the final spark, alive and light the shrines around a land fallen into darkness. 

This 2D Platformer is meant to be atmospheric and all self-made within 72h as our submission for Ludum Dare 46 - Theme " Keep it Alive ".

It's the first game we made as a team of three people, basically starting to play around with Unity about a month ago.

It was a fun project to learn gamedev that of course has about a million things left to do, but we hope you have at least a little fun should you decide to check it out.
